verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
D
Think about His love,
Think about His mercy,
Think about His grace,
That's brought us through.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
For as high as the heavens above,
So great is the measure
Of our Father's love.
Great is the measure
Of our Father's love.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
How could I forget His love,
How could I forget His mercy,
He satisfies, He satisfies,
He satisfies my desires,
Great is the measure of our Father's love.

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Even when I've strayed away,
His tender love has sought me out
And found me,
He found me,
And carried me back home
Great is the measure Of our Father's love.
